group_1.textCenter: (My current way of spying might've@reached its limits...)

group_1.narration: I've been getting closer to the three Magical Girls@that I met by chance at an arcade in Kamihama,@and I've been coaxing info about Kamihama@out of them bit by bit, but...
I've still been unable to get any clues@about the Automatic Purification System.
Now, I could just quickly lock these three up@and force the info out of them,@but there's a chance they don't know...
Perhaps I need to get farther into their good graces—@become a member of Kamihama Magia Union,@or in the course of doing so,@meet the group's leaders and directly elicit intel...

group_1.textCenter: ...Is it gonna be worth a try?
The message to send to Rena and the others...@...Will something like this work?

group_1.narration: im not sure if i wanna join the kamihama magia union,@like, i dont rlly wanna fight alone,@but i also dont know if i should just suddenly join up.@i wonder what the other magical girls r like,@and if u could introduce me to the leaders & stuff?

group_1.textCenter: I doubt those three would have the authority@to let me meet their leaders...

group_1.narration: so, on those leaders of that kmu we talked about@the other day, what kinda ppl r they like?@are they as loud as u guys lol?

group_1.textCenter: Maybe it'll seem less sus if it's lighthearted@like this...?
...*Sigh* I dunno, it just doesn't feel right.@I give up.
(Somehow...I feel like it's been a long time since@I last called Juri.)

group_1.textRight: FUCK YOU, RANKA! Where the hell are you@and what the FUCK are you up to?!
What happened to the daily report you used to@email us everyday?

group_1.textLeft: (My daily report to Juri and the others stopped...?)
(It's been a while since I called Juri...?)

group_1.textRight: That's why I called you to see if you had betrayed us.

group_1.textLeft: No way in hell would I ever betray you!
(I can't believe I got carried THAT far away by@those girls' pace...!)
